name: Salamangreat Soul Lion
text:
This card must be Soul Summoned by banishing a "Salamangreat" Link 3 Monster and cannot be summoned by other means.
If this card is Soul Summoned: You can target 1 card on your opponent's field; shuffle it into the Deck. Once per turn, during your Main Phase, if this card was Soul Summoned using "Salamangreat Heatleo" as material: You can target 1 face-up monster on the field and 1 monster in your GY; the ATK of the first target reduced by the ATK of the other target's, until the end of this turn.
